comment:
* Contains information about a schema change detected by an {@link ObserverCallback}. * *

This object will be sent when a schema type having a name matching an observer's schema * filters (as determined by {@link ObserverSpec#getFilterSchemas}) has been added, updated, or * removed. * *

Note that schema changes may cause documents to be migrated or removed. When this happens, * individual document updates will NOT be dispatched via {@link DocumentChangeInfo}. The only * notification will be of the schema type change via {@link SchemaChangeInfo}. Depending on your * use case, you may need to re-query the whole schema type when this happens.

methods.name: public String getPackageName()
methods.comment: Returns the package name of the app which owns the schema that changed.

methods.name: public String getDatabaseName()
methods.comment: Returns the database in which the schema that was changed resides.

methods.name: public Set<String> getChangedSchemaNames()
methods.comment:
* Returns the names of schema types affected by this change notification. * *

This will never be empty.
